page.title: 14A family in Pantycrug
page.content: We live in a 3 bedroomed bungalow. We get up at 7.30 am and have breakfast together, cereal & toast. Rachel leaves for the Welsh school in Aberystwyth at 8.20 on the school bus. Dad has a lift to work, Mum & Jonathan leave at 8.30 for Primary School in Capel Seion. Dad works as a cartographer for the whole of Wales at the Forestry Commission offices in Aberystwyth & finishes his days work at 5 pm. Mum is a cook at the village school and finishes work at 2 pm. We all have an evening meal at 5.30 pm. In summer Dad plays bowls and goes fishing, in winter he plays darts. Mum likes knitting & embroidery & she goes to the WI once a month. Children go to the Urdd, they like swimming and go to Sunday School. We have three cats.
